Name: ANDROMALIUS
About the game: ANDROMALIUS This is a short horror game, that delves into the nervewracking experience of moving into a new space. People are by nature scary beings, which fuels the fire even more when the dark of night covers the sky, and all is set on standby. So you have to ask yourself. Do you trust your new surroundings? Do you trust these new people that live along side you?
Meta Title: ANDROMALIUS: May 9, 2019, Unit Zero Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ANDROMALIUS? Check out the release date (May 9, 2019), developer insights from Unit Zero Studio, and a complete game summary.
